Question
========

Suppose that if rain is expected the probability is 60% that it will will actually rain. If ***no*** rain is expected the probability is 20% that it will rain. Rain is expected for 10% of the days of the next month. What is the probability that it will rain?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,06
* 0,12
* 0,24
* 0,80

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.06: Incorrect
* 0.12: Incorrect
* 0.24: Correct
* 0.80: Incorrect
